Name: 天降锦鲤 ~ My Lucky Koi
About the game: This is a Chinese short visual novel with single ending. Its`A humorous Daily story. 剧情简介 ——A friendship story between a hard worker and a Koi leprechaun. It is said that koi is an auspicious Totem！ I didn't believe it before. Now The road is tortuous, the future is really fragrant!!! Works category Minesweeper: Easy. Funny. daily. Sweet system. Adventure. Short story. Inspirational. CV 海棠不言 天降系腹黑妖精，抢着为我还花呗的怪人。 试图努力挽回主角的信仰，却总是弄巧成拙。 CV 恪诀 温柔的猫咖店老板大姐姐，似乎与瑞瑞有不共戴天之仇？ （无CV） 以及各路奇怪甲乙丙丁戊己庚辛壬癸…… 游戏剧本字数：约5w5k字 STAFF: 企划：33ParadoX&igstore 剧本：igs 程序：鱆 演出脚本：33ParadoX 美术：33ParadoX 考拉兄 CV：海棠不言 恪诀 音频后期：烤面筋 UI：匣中猫 33ParadoX 音乐：shimtone @ DOVA-SYNDROME
